document.full_text: the chief executive officer of exxon mobil corp, the world's largest publicly traded oil company, received $29 million in total compensation in 2010, a 6.6 percent increase from the previous year, a regulatory filing showed on wednesday.
document.title: exxon's ceo compensation up 6.6 percent
lines_and_colors: the chief executive officer of exxon mobil corp, the world's largest publicly traded oil company, received $29 million in total compensation in 2010, a 6.6 percent increase from the previous year, a regulatory filing showed on wednesday.
